idea: Political analysis of CBT, why is the philosophical foundation of CBT. What is it doing to individuals as political agents. A think enforcing the acceptance or moral relativism and create servility (weakness) need proof.
How do we grow as people without self comodification (Marxist sense) I think this was after reading the Early Manuscripts or Marx
Postmodernist critque on Librealism (Mill and Lock), so like looking at how art, archetecture, governing bodies etc changed after them.
At what number does wealth become immoral
Construct a proof against 'On Being Lazy', I kinda did in my god or nature is unproductive but a more holistic proof against laziness as a fight against capital.

Is masculinity, meaning assertive and otherwise traditionally masculine attributes (in a Western Context) necessary to flourish under capitalism. To put it another way beyond Marx's one page mentioning that the 'second sex' is the original exploited class for the culture created to suppress them into the labour of child bearing, does modern neoliberal capitalism enforce the same same sexist ethic?

Write up a utilitarian argument against closed source software, as well as a deontological argument. I have been thinking about this for years now and probably have the tools to, but have not gotten around to it because every argument ends up being a critique of private property. It is possible that I can avoid critical theory (it is not a very popular thesis as it is quite sad) if I just focus on ancient and modern philosophy, no time tho
